title: UFYB 132: Pleasure First Principle
itunes:title: Pleasure First Principle
description:
You can experience pleasure whenever and however you want, without permission from anyone else. I’m diving into how women don’t spend time on things we truly love, and why we’re not encouraged to take real pleasure seriously. Taking the time to create and experience pleasure is the best thing you can do for yourself, and I’m showing you how today.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/132
